effect.gold_silver: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.
effect.crystal: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4. If the target hasn’t used a move since entering the field, if it tried to use a move this turn and failed, or if its last used move has 0 PP remaining, this move will fail.

short_effect.gold_silver: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.
short_effect.crystal: Lowers the PP of the target’s last used move by 4.

flavor_text.gold_silver: Cuts the PP of the foe's last move.
flavor_text.crystal: Cuts the PP of the foe's last move.
